description: Remove a service type unit of measure from a job production plan.
permissions: Allowed for users authorized to access the related job production plan per JobProductionPlanServiceTypeUnitOfMeasurePolicy (delegated to job_production_plan).
side_effects: Deletes a job production plan service type unit of measure; enqueues background removal of time card service type unit of measures.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked when the service type unit of measure is a cohort trigger or part of a cohort while maintaining service type unit of measure cohorts is enabled.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed
